content: each of the next 2 sts * 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 sts repeat from * around 24 round 5 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 sts repeat from * around 30 round 6 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 4 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 4 sts repeat from * around 36 3 round 7 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 sts repeat from * around 42 round 8 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 6 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 6 sts repeat from * around 48 round 9 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 7 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 7 sts repeat from * around 54 round 10 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 8 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 8 sts repeat from * around 60 round 11 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in each of next 9 sts * 2sc in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 9 sts repeat from * around 66 note at the end of round 11 your base will measure approximately 6 5 across round 12 single_crochet in each st around to the end 66 rounds 12 - 32 working each round without joining repeat round 12 20 times or until the bag reaches a height of 9 5 from the base center do not fasten_off as you complete the final round of the body place a stitch marker in each of the following stitches 1 17 34 and 50 it is here where you will begin each tab for the bag without fastening off continue on to complete 4 tabs as follows first tab beginning in stitch 1 of the round single_crochet in the 1st st and the next 5 sts along the top edge * chain 1 turn single_crochet 6 repeat from * 6 times more for a total of 8 row fasten_off leaving a long tail for seaming the tab to the inner side of the bag along the last completed round of the body 6 second tab beginning in stitch 17 repeat directions as for the first tab beginning in marked st 17 third tab beginning in stitch 34 repeat directions as for the first tab beginning in marked st 34 4 fourth tab beginning in stitch 50 repeat directions as for the first tab beginning in marked st 50 once all four tabs have been completed use the long tail
